channel.title: Comments on: Making SSIS Dynamic: Passing variables between packages
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Tirupathirao
item.dc:creator: Tirupathirao
item.description: The way you explained it is working for me but child package task is executing but in parent execute package task is showing as Fail. can you give me an idea
item.content:encoded: The way you explained it is working for me but child package task is executing but in parent execute package task is showing as Fail. can you give me an idea

item.title: By: Dhiren
item.dc:creator: Dhiren
item.content:encoded:
Hi, this method of passing variable works for all the type of data except Object type.

How should we pass the Object type of data?
